Others: Bronny James made his debut for the Los Angeles Lakers in their preseason opener against the Minnesota Timberwolves.
JJ Redick praised Bronny James' defensive performance, highlighting his three blocks.
Bronny James scored his first basket with 56.2 seconds left in the game.
LeBron James did not play in the game due to rest, but it is expected that he will suit up for the game against the Phoenix Suns.
